data.title: Join us in celebrating the 2024 Oracle Excellence Award winners
data.meta_description: Recognizing the successes and accomplishments of our customers is a highlight of the work we do each day at Oracle.
data.text:
Recognizing the successes and accomplishments of our customers is a highlight of the work we do each day at Oracle. Whether it’s a national grocery chain shaving two full days off its financial close, a regional health system simplifying and enhancing human resources processes, or a financial software provider improving efficiency and customer satisfaction with generative AI, there’s already a lot to celebrate in 2024.

Which is why we’re thrilled to announce the winners of the 2024 Oracle Excellence Awards. These awards celebrate organizations that leverage Oracle’s cloud application and infrastructure technologies to drive business success, showcasing the achievements of some of the world’s most innovative and impactful companies.

These companies are using Oracle Cloud services to drive tangible, bottom-line results through their artificial intelligence, enterprise resource planning, supply chain management, human resources, marketing, IT, and sustainability initiatives. Here’s a look at this year’s honorees.
